dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neera and Eckle look all around. No sign of Lem. Then, they hear a SOUND from a nearby police car. They find Lem in t front seat, pulling out the ignition wires.

dialogues.speaker: NEERA
dialogues.text: Lem, what are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: It's called hot-wiring. I think it's an earth custom. Lem touches the wires. The engine starts. Lem steps up to them. Neera and

dialogues.speaker: LEM, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I got my life back, but it turns out I don't want it anymore. Skiff exchange a confused look.

dialogues.speaker: NEERA
dialogues.text: I don't understand.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: My friend's in trouble. I'm gonna go help him. (steps up to Neera) Maybe you'd be better off with Glar. Someone who can give you a stable life with secur... Neera suddenly hauls off and kisses Lem. A long pause. Then, she lets him go.

dialogues.speaker: LEM, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Or, not.

dialogues.speaker: NEERA
dialogues.text: I'm going with you!

dialogues.speaker: ECKLE
dialogues.text: Me too!

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: Well that's great, but I don't know where I'm going.  Suddenly, from nearby:

dialogues.speaker: SKIFF, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Yes you do. They turn to see Skiff with a dog carrier. He opens it to reveal ROVER. Excited, Rover wags his 'tail' and rushes u to Lem.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: Rover!

dialogues.speaker: NEERA
dialogues.text: In all the excitement, we couldn't tell you. Skiff pulled a switch. Lem looks at Skiff, amazed. They exchange a smile. Lem le down to Rover.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: Rover, where's Chuck? Can you find Chuck??? Rover looks around as if trying to find the scent. Then suddenly, his tracking light blinks. The direction leads off into the desert. Rover looks at them and nods.

dialogues.speaker: SKIFF
dialogues.text: (excited) We're going to Base 9!!!

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: C'mon! They get in the car to guitar strains of a FOLK SONG. cur TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The music comes from Glar who starts a song TBD about the end of the protest movement. The Teens are taking apart their protest signs. Lem drives by and stops. He gets and idea and backs up.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: Glar, how'd you like a cause you can really sing about? Glar stops playing and looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dig! (off confused faces) Cool! (off confused faces) Far out! Still no one gets it. The Teens

dialogues.speaker: GLAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What I mean to say is that would be really desirable. smile.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: Take the desert road. We'll meet up ahead. Lem drives on. cur TO:

dialogues.speaker: BASE 9/CHUCK'S CELL
dialogues.text: A dozen or so guards enter and aim their rifles at Chuck, all terrified of him. Last, Grawl enters, looking formidable.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL
dialogues.text: So you thought you could take over our world! Your kind knows no decency!

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: My kind??? (to nearby soldier) Did you hear that?? (to Grawl) That is species profiling!

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL
dialogues.text: Tell us your invasion plans! And don't bother taking over my mind. If you do... (points) Captain Kizno has orders to shoot me. If you take over Captain Kizno's mind, Liutenant Groit has orders to shoot him. If you take over Lieutenant Groit's mind, Sergeant Yerk will shoot Captain  Kizno, Lieutenant Groit and myself along with these three soldiers. Each soldier has a designated target in the squad. Should you succeed in taking over all of our minds, Corporal Hisk... He points to a Hisk at the far end of the room, standing an electric console.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ... has orders to electrocute everyone. If all this fails, the entire base is rigged to blow at the touch of a button. Grawl reveals a REMOTE BASE DESTRUCT DEVICE with a big re button. Chuck is dumbfounded. A confused private ventures:

dialogues.speaker: CONFUSED PRIVATE 1
dialogues.text: General, am I supposed to shoot Hecknavar or Kolski?

dialogues.speaker: CONFUSED PRIVATE 2
dialogues.text: I shoot Kolski!

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL
dialogues.text: No, you shoot Meckavoy.

dialogues.speaker: CONFUSED PRIVATE 2
dialogues.text: Then who shoots Kolski?

dialogues.speaker: KOLSKI
dialogues.text: (offers) I can shoot myself.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL
dialogues.text: That won't be necessary. Hecknavar, you shoot Kolski, Captain Kisno and graze Corporal Hisk.

dialogues.speaker: HECKNAVAR
dialogues.text: Yes, Sir! Hecknavar shoots Corporal Hisk in the leg.

dialogues.speaker: CORPORAL HISK
dialogues.text: Ahhhhgh! !

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL
dialogues.text: Not yet!  Suddenly all soldiers aim their guns at each other.

dialogues.speaker: KOLSKI
dialogues.text: Drop your weapon!

dialogues.speaker: OTHER SOLDIERS
dialogues.text: You! No, him first! I'm not taking my eyes off Kisno! Drop it dirtbag! A pause. Suddenly, soldiers start shooting and diving for cover. Chuck looks on, nonplussed. Trying to shout above maelstrom:

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL
dialogues.text: Hold your fire!! ANGLE ON CORPORAL HISK at his console. He flips levers, delivering painful electric shocks to the soldiers who continue to shoot at each other. ON Chuck, watching in disbelief. Finally:

dialogues.speaker: HOLD YOUR FIRE
dialogues.text: That finally stops the battle.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Captain Kizno, get everyone out of here! The soldiers start limping away and carrying off the wounded. Grawl glowers over Chuck.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: You're not thinking that's my fault, right?

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL
dialogues.text: Professor Kipple! Dramatic pause. Kipple enters dressed for surgery.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He's all yours! Kipple glows. This is what he's been waiting for. Chuck i terrified. cur TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lem pulls into the gas station with the team, passing th huge, 50's-stylized sign. They get out and look around. There is NOTHING around anywhere. They turn to Rover, who's excited, his red tracking light blinking wildly.

dialogues.speaker: SKIFF
dialogues.text: He thinks we found him. Lem looks around.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: (sad, to himself) Poor Chuck, I let you down. cur TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chuck is strapped to a table. The two mind-controlled soldiers are wheeled out on gurneys. Their heads are bandaged. A doctor walks behind them with jars labeled "brains". Kipple emerges. He examine's Chuck's skull longingly.

dialogues.speaker: PROFESSOR KIPPLE
dialogues.text: A brain even larger than mine. What must it be capable of!

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: Dude, it's totally under-utilized. I spent four years at a party school. Trust me, it's mush.

dialogues.speaker: PROFESSOR KIPPLE
dialogues.text: We'll find out, won't we. I once had the largest brain on the planet. Now -- (reveals his instruments) I'll have the two largest. Mine and yours. Kipple nods to the doctors who start to wheel Chuck into operating room. cur TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lem and the others enter. The place is dilapidated, rundo

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: Hello....! Anyone here! Suddenly, a rattling SOUND. They turn to see Skiff is try to get a display case door open. Inside, a lone, dusty ol candy bar sits on a display stand.

dialogues.speaker: LEM, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: SKIFF
dialogues.text: No one's around, I'm not gonna get in trouble. Skiff pulls the door open and reaches for the candy bar. he picks it up, HOLD ON THE DISPLAY STAND which sinks dow A low, powerful rumbling begins. The whole building begin to shake violently. Lem looks at Skiff angrily. Skiff's e goes wide. He quickly takes coins from his pocket and hol them up, announcing:

dialogues.speaker: SKIFF, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'm paying! I'm paying! Suddenly, a monstrous NOISE from out front. They look out see: Slowly, unbelievably, the giant gas station SIGN begins t flip over. As it heads underground, its other side winds on top. Its other side is a ramp that leads downward. Lem and team are stunned silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The team steps up to the ramp. There are landing lights heading downward. A quick look over the edge shows that d below is a massive army base. It's like an underground ci teaming with soldiers. This is BASE 9.

dialogues.speaker: NEERA
dialogues.text: There's soldiers everywhere. How are we gonna get in? Suddenly, SOUND of a car pulling up. It's Glar and the teens.  Lem sees them and smiles. He's got an idea. cur TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chuck is scared. Kipple reveals a scary buzz saw.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: (scared) I don't suppose your planet's invented Demerol??? Kipple pulls the cord and starts the saw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We say "ext" only because we're outside the Base 9 buildings. But this is really a vast underground space that's beneath a 200 foot ceiling. Soldiers are going about their normal routine when they begin to hear something. It sounds like chanting. ANGLE ON THE RAMP LEADING DOWN. It's Glar and the teens i his hippie car. They carry signs that say: LET THE MAN GO

dialogues.speaker: THING TO WASTE
dialogues.text: They chant:

dialogues.speaker: TEENS
dialogues.text: One, two, three, four, we don't want your alien war! (etc.) After 3 or 4 rounds, a guitar STRUM stops it. REVEAL GLAR in full Dylan regalia including an alien harmonica around his neck. He's starting a song similar to "Times Are A Changing".

dialogues.speaker: GLAR
dialogues.text: Now come all you aliens, don't be afraid. Your welcome we still are arranging. We used to think you're the enemy come. But the times they are a diff-er-ent. He gives one blast on the harmonica, then looks up at the surrounded soldiers. Music stops.

dialogues.speaker: GLAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Uh, is being here against the rules? ANGLE WIDE behind the soldiers (so's not to see any violence) as the soldiers attack and the teens flee. ANGLE BEHIND THE VAN. Lem and team sneak out and make the way unseen into Base 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About to open Chuck's skull, Professor Kipple guns the motor, stalling it. It stops dead. Chuck sighs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A couple of soldiers guard the front door. Around the side, the team hides. What to do? Eckle signal from the side of the building. He's found an air vent. Th others join him. Rover leads the way, tracking Chuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The team is in the building ventilation shaft, following Rover. Rover comes to another grate and pushes it open. T all crawl out to:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are many glass cases holding displays. Each contain something that fell out of the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doctors are gathered around the buzz saw.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR 1
dialogues.text: Maybe you should give it more gas.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR 2
dialogues.text: You'll flood it.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR 3
dialogues.text: What if you open the choke? Chuck rolls his eyes at these morons. Finally, annoyed:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh give me a break! You don't open the choke 'till after the engine starts! The doctors stop. Professor Kipple pulls the cord. The engine roars back to life. Chuck MOANS at own stupidity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up ahead, Rover points the way to a door.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: It's this way! They dash out and find the hall empty. They run for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kipple approaches Chuck with the saw. Closer. Closer. Suddenly, the door bursts open. Lem and team rush in. So close to his prize, Kipple goes for Chuck's skull. But he's suddenly sawing metal. In the last second, Rover pla a metal claw in the way. The doctors back off. Kipple looks around and furtively sneaks to the back of the room. Lem and Neera untie Chuck. He embraces them.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: Guys, this is so Luke Skywalker! Chuck checks his DIGITAL READOUT out. 25 minutes left.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We gotta book.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: How do we find your ship? Chuck smiles and flips a switch on Rover. Rover's trackin light starts flashing.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: Rover'll lead us right to it. Suddenly, a BEEERRRRAAAAP alarm goes off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kipple has pressed the alarm. He heads out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group pokes their heads out. No sign of soldiers.

dialogues.speaker: SKIFF
dialogues.text: You think they know where we are? Suddenly shots ring out and bullets hit nearby.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: I'm thinking that's a 'yes'. They head off. Two soldiers follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grawl comes out of his office, putting on his jacket. He meets up with the Kipple.

dialogues.speaker: PROFESSOR KIPPLE
dialogues.text: General, you must save its brain.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL
dialogues.text: I'm more concerned with saving our world! Grawl picks up the REMOTE DESTRUCT DEVICE and looks grim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chasing our team, two soldiers round the corner and stop suddenly when they see: Neera, standing alone, looking her hippie finest. She hol three flowers in her hand. They exchange a look. Neera approaches them.

dialogues.speaker: NEERA
dialogues.text: I know you don't really want to make war. She puts the stem of a flower in each.

dialogues.speaker: NEERA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This one's for peace. (next flower)  This one's for love. With a flower in each of their rifles, they look at the third in her hand.

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIER 4
dialogues.text: What's that for? Suddenly, Chuck comes up behind them.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: That's for you. He punches one. He holds his hand and GROANS in pain. Lem punches the other and holds his hand too. As the team run on Chuck bemoans his sore hand:

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: They make it look so easy in the movies!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two mind-controlled soldiers are sitting up in their beds, legs crossed casually, sipping beverages from paper cups as if they were at a cocktail party. They each have massive bandages on their empty heads.

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIER 1
dialogues.text: That professor's a genius!

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIER 2
dialogues.text: I feel positively effervescent.

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIER 1
dialogues.text: In fine fettle. What a salubrious experience!

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIER 2
dialogues.text: Well said. Cheers. They "clink" paper cups, crushing them completely, yet continuing to mime drinking as if they still held water. (NOTE: This scene might make a great button during or aft the closing credits.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Following Rover, the team reaches this massive hanger. Th look around, confused. Neera taps Lem and points to: CHUCK'S SHIP. They approach in wonder. It's a great sigh

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: How do we get it out of here? In answer, Eckle finds a control panel hanging from a lon chain. He presses it, causing the roof overhead to split start to open, revealing the sky above. A beautiful momen They all look up, thrilled. Some affectionate chucks on the shoulder for Eckle.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: Way to go, kid. Suddenly:

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Step away from the flying saucer and put your hands in the air! They turn and see Grawl. Next to him, Kipple. Then, the whole army shows up. In short order, they're surrounded. The team exchanges a look. They're trapped. Grawl steps u He holds up the destruct button.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You never had a chance. Grawl flips the "ready" button. Destruct devices around t room arm themselves.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: You'd destroy the whole base just to get me?

dialogues.speaker: NEERA
dialogues.text: That's sick!

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: (aside) Actually, it's kind of flattering.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL
dialogues.text: Sick, young lady, is helping the enemy of your world! Sick is befriending a creature that's so completely -- different!! Sick is - (points to Chuck) Well look, it's right in front of you! (to Kipple)  I'm sorry, Professor, it's too dangerous to let the alien live another minute. THROUGH GRAWL'S POV, his scope on Chuck's head, we SUDDEN SEE LEM STEP IN FRONT. Lem approaches the General gingerly, trying to have a hea to heart talk. As he talks, he gets closer and closer.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: General, I know what you're afraid of. I understand, I'm afraid of it too. It's not Chuck. It's not aliens or monsters. It's something even scarier. It's the unknown. I've spent my whole life running from it. And I think maybe you have too. But the unknown isn't something to be afraid of. (with a smile at Chuck) It can be your best friend. (to Grawl) And just when you think it means the end of everything you know... (a sly look at his team) It's really just the beginning. Lem suddenly grabs the REMOTE BASE DESTRUCT DEVICE and presses the red button. A frozen moment. Grawl stares in disbelief. Lem can't eve believe it. And suddenly: THE BASE ALARM SOUNDS. They hear:

dialogues.speaker: LOUDSPEAKER VOICE
dialogues.text: Base destruct, two minutes. The soldiers all stare in horror. They exchange looks. Le turns to Kipple.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: What are you looking at? Run!!! Kipple runs. Other soldiers follow and soon they're all fleeing except Grawl. Grawl stares in disbelief. Then, furious, he aims his gun right at Lem... .»-. Suddenly his arm is grabbed. It's Neera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my boyfriend!!! She punches Grawl. Grawl is stunned, but not knocked out. He's about to raises his gun again. This time it's Eckle jumps in, swinging the control panel, knocking Grawl out. As the room empties of soldiers, Lem turns to Chuck.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: Let's go!

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: Everyone on board! The team rushes for the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chuck starts all systems. But he grimaces.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: What's the matter?

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: No time for auto pilot. (realizes) I'm gonna have to fly this thing! (pressing buttons) I am so putting in for overtime. A bit nervous, he starts pressing buttons. SOUND of the s powering up.

dialogues.speaker: LOUDSPEAKER VOICE
dialogues.text: Base destruct, 1 minute. Chuck gets ready to lift off. But then he notices Grawl unconscious on the floor. ON THE HATCH as Lem and Skiff ready to pull it shut.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: (grudgingly) Wait....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chuck bolts out the ship and heads for Grawl. Skiff and Lem poke their heads out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you doing?

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: I can't leave him here!

dialogues.speaker: SKIFF
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: (smiles, re: Chuck) ‘Cause he's got the Right Stuff. Lem steps out to help. They get Grawl on board.

dialogues.speaker: LOUDSPEAKER VOICE
dialogues.text: Base destruct, 15 seconds... They close the ship's hatch.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: This is gonna be rough!

dialogues.speaker: LOUDSPEAKER VOICE
dialogues.text: Base destruct, 10 seconds. 9. 8... The engines start. Slowly, too slowly, the ship starts to lift.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: She's heavy! He hits the throttle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship is starting to pick up momentum.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the soldiers, Glar and the Teens have gotten out of base and stand watching as.... THERE'S A MASSIVE RUMBLING AND EXPLOSIONS BELOW. Before them, a volcano-like EXPLOSION from the ground. Th stare in horror until... They see a ship emerge, flying out just ahead of the flam The NASA capsule launches precariously upward. ON THE TEENS, cheering. ON KIPPLE, as the the mind-controlled soldiers step up.

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIER 1
dialogues.text: Doc, that brain operation was inspired!

dialogues.speaker: SOLDIER 2
dialogues.text: You simply must try it! As they take him away, Kipple looks around. It's clear he can't get away from them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON CHUCK, piloting, proud that he did it. Quickly, the view changes. Blue sky becomes black space a stars. A magical moment as they break orbit and make it t space. They all stare out in awe. Chuck releases Lem's strap, causing Lem to float up in ze gravity. The others join him. Lem floats to the window, where he looks out at the view a lifetime. Chuck floats next to him.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: Whatta you think?

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: What a big universe!! (looks at Chuck, smiles) I am definitely coming back here! General Grawl wakes up and sees where they are, sees he's weightless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you going to take over my mind?

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: You can keep it.

dialogues.speaker: ECKLE
dialogues.text: General, you've been reading too many comic books.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: (to all) Strap in everyone, I'm taking you home. Grawl stares in wonder at everyone floating back to their seats. It's a marvel and he allows a small smile. Chuck starts to bring the ship down for a landing. From their POV, they get closer and closer to the planet. Below, a continent, a vast stretch of land, suburbia and finally...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chuck's ship lands. People approach warily. Police cars p up and officers aim their guns, including Chief Gorloc. The hatch opens. Lem and gang step out, followed by Grawl and finally by Chuck. The police aim their guns at Chuck. Grawl steps in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: GRAWL
dialogues.text: It's all right, Chief. He's with me. (turns to Chuck) Captain... Thanks for saving my life. Grawl salutes Chuck, who smiles and salutes back.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: A pleasure, General. Maybe next time you have guests, you'll throw a better party. As Chuck turns to Eckle, more people arrive. Among them, Lem's parents. They run up and hug him. Eckle's parents arrive and embrace Neera. The onlookers see Chuck acting friendly and watch, curious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Eckle) Kid, how'd you like to be president of the Planet One Chuck Baker fan club? Eckle nods, proudly. Chuck reaches into his suit and pull out a massive stack of SIGNED HEADSHOTS. Chuck rises and sees Skiff. Then, he turns to Rover.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Rover, you coming or you want to stay here? Rover looks at Chuck and again at Skiff. He decides and sidles up to Skiff with love.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Skiff) He needs oil every 3000 miles and a whole lotta love. Skiff is overjoyed that Rover gets to stay. They jump aro together. Now the crowd is filling in. Chuck checks his DIGITAL READOUT and looks around anxiously for... Lem, who's across the crowd, looking for Chuck. Through t throng they meet eyes and smile. They approach, stand before each other smiling wordlessly Then:

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lem, you saved my life.

dialogues.speaker: LEM
dialogues.text: (a smile) You saved mine too. Neera joins Lem. Chuck turns to her.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: You got a good man there.

dialogues.speaker: NEERA
dialogues.text: (smiles) I know. Chuck turns back to Lem. They hug. Then Chuck heads for h ship. At the door, he turns back to Lem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ever make it to earth, I'm in the phone book. Chuck gets in his ship. Everyone backs away. To a great swell of MUSIC, the ship takes off. People wav good-bye. ON LEM, watching, moved. He and Neera exchange a look and they kiss. Skiff and Rover see this, both touched. Skiff dabs his eyes with a handkerchief and hands it to Rover w does the same.
